column4: i'm running 10.04 and i'm wanting to set up clamav... the version in the main repo is too old, and the ppa doesn't seem to have a new clamav
find the website for that program
it points me to the ppa
might be like super tux kart, the ubuntu repos dont actually have the newest version
which doesn't contain what is needed, I also checked the official ubuntu docs and those don't help
yeah... i use getdeb and playdeb for that stuff
clamav is supposeadly in the backports, but it seems like the ubuntu team has been a bit slow on keeping it up to date
does it look for linux viruss or windows viruses?
we're using it for windows viruses and such
im not sure if the amd site has linux drivers
